Service.Name: WMS
Service.Title: CIRB WMS
Service.Abstract: Web Map Service for the CIRB layers

inspire_common:Specification.inspire_common:Title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services

Layer.Title: CIRB WMS
Layer.Abstract: Web Map Service for the CIRB layers

Layer.Name: urbis:LabeledStreetAxe
Layer.Title: LabeledStreetAxe
Layer.Abstract: Labeled StreetAxe for OSIRIS, bug fix for the juxtaposition of street name on building

Style.Name: OsirisLineFrLblZoom
Style.Title: SLD Cook Book: Label following line for osiris

Style.Name: OsirisLineFrLblZoom
Style.Title: SLD Cook Book: Label following line for osiris

Style.Name: OsirisLineNlLblZoom
Style.Title: SLD Cook Book: Label following line for osiris

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_A_ADPT
Layer.Title: Address points
Layer.Abstract: This layer is the localization of address points of the Brussels Region

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_A_BU
Layer.Title: Buildings
Layer.Abstract: This layer represents the buildings of the Brussels Region

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_A_MD
Layer.Title: Monitoring districts
Layer.Abstract: This layer reprensent the monitoring districts of the Brussels Region

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_A_MU
Layer.Title: Municipalities
Layer.Abstract: This layer represents the municipalities of the Brussels Region

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_A_MY_SA
Layer.Title: Street axes
Layer.Abstract: This layer represents the axes of the street of the Brussels Region

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_A_MY_SS
Layer.Title: Street sections
Layer.Abstract: This layer represents the street sections of the Brussels Region

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_A_MZ
Layer.Title: Municipal zips
Layer.Abstract: This layer is the zip of the municipality of the Brussels Region

Style.Name: polygon
Style.Title: A boring default style
Style.Abstract: A sample style that just prints out a transparent red interior with a red outline

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_A_POL
Layer.Title: Police districts
Layer.Abstract: This layer is the police districts of the Brussels Region

Style.Name: polygon
Style.Title: A boring default style
Style.Abstract: A sample style that just prints out a transparent red interior with a red outline

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_A_RE
Layer.Title: Region
Layer.Abstract: This layer is the Brussels Region

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_A_SD
Layer.Title: Statistical districts
Layer.Abstract: This layer represents the limit of the statistical districts of the Brussels Region

Style.Name: polygon
Style.Title: A boring default style
Style.Abstract: A sample style that just prints out a transparent red interior with a red outline

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_A_SN
Layer.Title: Street nodes
Layer.Abstract: This layer represents the street nodes. Each node is an intersection or an extremity of a street axe

Style.Name: point
Style.Title: A boring default style
Style.Abstract: A sample style that just prints out a purple square

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_M_RTLINE
Layer.Title: Rail tracks
Layer.Abstract: This layer represents the rails tracks.

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_M_SHAPE
Layer.Title: UrbisMap shapes
Layer.Abstract: This layer represents the shapes of UrbisMap.

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_M_TONAME_LIN
Layer.Title: Toponymy
Layer.Abstract: This layer represents the toponymy of public places.

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_M_ZIPOINT
Layer.Title: Points of interest
Layer.Abstract: This layer represents the point of zone of interest.

Style.Name: point
Style.Title: A boring default style
Style.Abstract: A sample style that just prints out a purple square

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_T_LINE
Layer.Title: Urbis Topo Lines
Layer.Abstract: This layer represents the topo lines.

Style.Name: urbis_topo_line
Style.Title: A boring default style
Style.Abstract: A sample style that just prints out a green line

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_T_POINT
Layer.Title: Urbis Topo Points
Layer.Abstract: This layer represents the topo points.

Style.Name: urbis_topo_point
Style.Title: A boring default style
Style.Abstract: A sample style that just prints out a purple square

Layer.Name: urbis:URB_A_SI_POINT_VW
Layer.Title: Street sides
Layer.Abstract: Street sides

Layer.Abstract: This layer represents the base map in french.

Layer.Title: Urbis Base Map NL
Layer.Abstract: This layer represents the base map in dutch.
